div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvj die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander
Sanchar' to ansuer' to the borghe' Strekit one him be Johne
talyour' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of his parte of xxtj
merkis als'mekile as suld' extend to my his parte of resone xxxtj
d' of Siluer for j bage and xj d' of lent Siluer

The said day the balyeis assignit this day fiftene dais to Androw
litstar' to Ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Jonhne
andirsone the he has nocht fulfillit his billis send with him
in Danskin and wrangis tharintill perempturlie but ony dilatouris
with consent of batht the said partiis

The said day the bailyeis assignit sonday that next cumis to thomas
rolland to ansuer to Anthonius laurence procurator to the Relict barnis
and executouris of vmquhile arnald' vanstakinburghe portar of brugis
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xiiij s' iiij g' and demi
barrel of Salmond perempturlie but ony excepcion with consent
of batht the saide partiis eftir the tenor' of the said thomas
obligacion and thai discernit the copy of the said obligacion
to the saide thomas one his expens'

Eodem die marioria Edindeauche relicta quondam Alexandri ranison'
fecit constituit creauit nominavit and ordinauit Robertum Cullane suum verum
legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem actorem et factorem ad petendum Ab Alexandro
nachty j pety quarterium Salis ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsam concer
nentibus et cetera de receptis acquitand' prosequend' agend' defendend'
promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame lammyntone oblist him be the fatht' of
his bodie to content and pay to gilbert menyes ane barrel of Salmund'
sufficient merchand' gude for thome chamer talyour' to be pait at
the next mydsomir' or xv dais thareftir at the farrast

add.foreign: dominus de allirdes' et Robertus glenmaluyn

div.p:
The saide day Jonhne allirdes of that Ilk and thomas prat
burges of this burghe' oblist thame coniunctlie and Seueralie
thar' ayris executouris and assignez be the fathtis of thar' bodiis
Renunciand' ale benefice of diuisione to freithe releywe and
keipe Agnes malisone the videw of vmquhile murthow
glenmaluyn and Robert glenmaluyn his Sone and ayr' thar ayris
executouris ande assignez Skathles anent fourty fiwe pundis
vsuale money of Scotlande of the barnyspart of gudis perte
ning to Jonhne malisone Sone and ayr' to vmquhile
William malisone for the quhilkis xlv li' the saide Jonhne
of allirdes' causit the saide Jonhne malisone his cistir sone
be Infeft be chartir ande Sesin of ane annuell Rent of
fourty fiwe Schillingis of the said Robertis his lande liand in the Castalgate
one the northt parte of the saide gate et cetera as in the chartir maid
to him tharapone mair' fullie is contenit And' of ane annuele
rent of xlv s' of the new land' that the saide Agnes in
Sesin of to Warand' the first annuell rent to the saide Johne
malisone

The saide day the bailyeis with avis' of the Consale In hoip
of concord continevit the actione debatabile betuix thomas
rolland' and Anthonius laurence anent the clame of xiiij s' g' et
iiij g' and of demi barrell of Salmond' to friday this day viij dais
In siclik strintht as it is in this day but preiudice to ony party

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Sexto
die februarij anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis continevit the action' debatabile betuix
Anthonius et cetera et thomas rollande anent xiiij s' g' and iiij g' and demi
barrel Salmond' in siclik Strintht and effect as it is now to mo
nunday that next cumis

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio ix die fe
bruarij quo supra

Eodem die Anthonius laurencij procuratorio nomine relicte prolium et executoris
quondam Arnaldi vanstakinburghe opidam de brugis concessit se alias
recipisse a magistro Alexandro gordone rectore de contone duas li' g'
monete flandrie ipsius heredes suos executores et assignatos exinde
quieteclamavit Imperpetuum

The saide day Alexander Sanquhar lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to Ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Jonhne talyour' for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of his part of xxtj merkis xxxtj d' and xj
d' tharfor the balyeis ordanit henry Orvm officiar pas' and tak ane
distreis' fra the saide Alexander and latt it agane to borghe' gif it be
askit and warne him to this day xv dais as the thrid day of
proces'

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas Symson'
forspekar that Nichol bevmond sal restor' and deliuer to James Kennarty
the pott that was plegit to Canny blinsele fre but ony siluer

the saide day Dauid Spens come Souerte to entir Jonhne turnour'
one friday that next cumis at the Instance of Jonhne litstar that day
to produce his witnes and se tham expremit anent the clame of

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die
februarij anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander chamer yongar Souerte and cautionar become to the
ballieis to Entir Jonhne of myll duelland in Rothay befor the
aldirman and balyeis within xv dais eftir he be warnit tharto to ansuer'
for forstallinge of the borghe

The saide day William goldsmith tuk to preywe the action' and clame
movit agane him be michaele Jonhnesone of fores tuechinge thre
golding lewis endit And the balyeis assignit the xiij day of this
Instant februar' to the said Williame to preyve his said allegeance
with his avne Consent

The saide day Richerd narne was conuikit for the strubulance of Androw branch'
wif tharfor it was ordanit be the assis' that gif euire the said Richerd
offendis to ony famous' persone in tym to cum and beis conuikit tharin he
sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tenta xiij die
februarij ano quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod thomas robertsone
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Dauid robertsone patris suj

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die
die februarij anno quo supra

the saide day thomas Symmir' burges of Dunde follouit Canny
ancroft for the wranguis' Intrometinge and avay puttinge of his
boyt quhilk scho denyit Ande in continent with consent of batht the
said partiis the saide action' was put to the decisione of ane
Suorne assis' quhilkis riplie avisit deliuerit be the moutht
of Alexander chamer of murchill forspekar' that the saide Agnes wrang
uislie Intrometit with the said boyt and aw to pay the samyn
or the vaile of it to the saide thomas be pasche that next
cumis for the quhilkis scho was in ane Amerciament of the court'

The saide day Jonet traile the Relict of Jonhne Westland
was quyt of ale Intrometinge of the saide boyt be
the saide assis' Alexander chamer of murchill forspekar'

The saide day the wif of thomas narne was in Ane
amerciament of the Courte for the wranguis' strubulance of gilbert
menyeis balye and to Amend as law will and forber' in tym
to Cum

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander
chamer forspekar that patrik leslie sal mak compt' rekning
and pament to thomas prat of fyftene frankis waring
sic as come hame in that rays' the said thomas payand' the
fraucht of it and xxx d' for the grathing of the kelin and the west
fraucht for demi moy of Salt And the said patrik sal pay for
ane bonat' to the said' thomas

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

the said day Richerd narne comperit and offerit him redy to ansuer'
to the wif and procuratouris of thomas narne anent the clame of his
seruice and Anent compt and rekning clamit one the said Richard
and causit philp Dunbrek officiar' pas' and warne hir' at hir' hous'
to cum and follow the saide Richerd Ande becaus' scho come nocht
nor' nayne in hir' nayme to follou the said Richerd he protestit solempnitlie
to be quyt of hir' challance and for remeide of law

the saide day the wif of vmquhile Androw peterkin oblist hir' be
hir vphaldin to deliuer' and restoir' to Williame vmfray his
pott within xv dais

The saide day the balyeis chargit Jonhne andirsone to pay to
Androu litstar' xxiij Scottis optenit one him within terme of law

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Williame blinsele
forspekar that gif marione Kay bringis Sufficient previs one monunday
that next cumis befor the balyeis that scho hed ane goldin lew befor
the fest of Sanct nicholes last bigane scho is quyt of the lew
followit be the wif of thomas mar' Ande falyeing' of hir' previs
the said marione sale content and pay the said lew

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegius legalis quod georgius Dys'
erit Indempnis pro thoma sadlar' et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et
Willelmus portar deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas erit ImdempnisIndempnis
pro dicto georgio et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et quilibet dictorum
parcium obligaciones ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes de huiusmodi
fideiussione per manuum ostensionem

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij
die mensis februarij anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit Wednisday that next cumis
to thomas rolland to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him
be alexander cansy' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of j pruys
stane of lynt

the said day the balyeis and diuers' of the Counsale and communite
present for the tyme grantit leif to sere Jonhne prat thar' chap
lane to pas' to Sanct James his pilgrimage but preiudice
to his chaplanry of the Croice altar quhile his hame cuminge
sere mathou nicholsone or ony vthir chaplane makand ministra
cione at the said altar to his agane Cuminge
The

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die mensis februarij quo supra

Eodem die dominus Nicholaius sclugy monachus de Deir fecit constituit
creauit et ordinavit Alexandrum rede patricium rede et Willelmum blinsel coniunctim
et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum et exigendum a Duncano talyour'
totas summas annuj redditus sibi debit' et de receptis acquitand' Agend'
defendend' prosequend' promitten' de Rato et grato cum ceteris terminis
necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo die
marcij Anno quo supra

The saide day Williame gareauche eldar come Souerte be his
hande landis and gudis for Jonhne moir' to be responsale to the
nerrast lauchfull ayr' of vmquhill Williame moire for the malis
and profittis that he resauis of the lande pertening to the said vm
quhill Williame liand within this borghe Ande the saide Johne
oblist him be his hande landis and gudis to freithe releyve ande
keipe the saide Williame Skathles of the saide Souerte

The saide day Duncan talyour' was quyt be ane Suorne assis'
of ale annuell Rentis clamit be dene nichol sclugy of ale
termes bigane be ane Suorne assis' Williame blinsel for
spekar of the saide assis'

The saide day It was fundin ande deliuerit be ane Suorne
assis' thomas prat forspekar that Jonhne blak has resavit fourtj
Schillingis of the annuell rent of Duncane talyouris hous' In
the name of Duncane dene nichol sclugy Ande thai sale pas' and compt and rekning to giddir and thareftir And samekile as the
saide Jonhne will depone be his aithe that he has pait to the
saide dene nicholl of the saide xlti s' he salbe fre and he sale
pay the remanent of the saide fourty Schillingis to the saide
dene nicholl

head.add: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Richardi gareauche

div.p:
Alexander Rede thomas prat Andreas murray senior Willelmus
futhes Willelmus blinsel Andreas Culane senior Alexander nachty Willelmus
Kintor Johannes moire Duncanus smitht patricius andirsone Andreas
litstar Andreas ancroft Dauid Kintor Duncanus talyour' et Willelmus
ranisone Jurati dicunt quod quondam Ranaldus talyour' auus Richardi
gareauche latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in
vico castri ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Andree murray Judicatoris
ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi mernys ex occidentali
partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Ranaldus est legittimus et propinquior heres
vnus de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Ranaldj auj suj
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc
per annum xiij s' et iiij d' Et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod
tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burga
gium Et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis ut de per
quatuor annos aut eocirca racione decessus dicti quondam Ranaldi auj
suj in defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis
